meanings.definition: Limitless or endless in space, extent, or size.
meanings.sent1: The universe is filled with infinites possibilities.
meanings.sent2: The desert seemed to stretch on for infinites miles.
meanings.sent3: The buffet had an infinites amount of food, I couldn't decide what to eat first!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as vast and infinites as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The starry sky at night was a display of infinites beauty.

meanings.definition: A number greater than any assignable quantity or countable number.
meanings.sent1: In mathematics, we learn about infinites and how they compare to finite numbers.
meanings.sent2: The concept of infinites can be difficult to grasp for some students.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled an infinites amount of scarves out of his hat!
meanings.sent4: His patience seemed to be an infinites when dealing with difficult customers.
meanings.sent5: The library had an infinites collection of books to choose from.

meanings.definition: A concept or value that is beyond calculation or measurement.
meanings.sent1: The idea of infinites in philosophy can be quite abstract.
meanings.sent2: Scientists often deal with infinites when studying the vastness of the universe.
meanings.sent3: The treasure chest was said to hold an infinites amount of gold coins.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness knew no bounds, it was an infinites that touched everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The artist's creativity seemed to flow from an infinites source of inspiration.
